message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its many benefits, I'm offering it for $20,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $20,000 is significantly more than I'm willing to pay.  Considering its value to me, I'd be happy to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is closer to the true value of this product.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $17,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm prepared to pay $12,000, which is a fair compromise given the value to both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations in terms of value. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
